intro: Cardiacanthus neesianus, commonly known as the New Zealand heartleaf, is a rare flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the family Cucurbitaceae, which includes cucumbers and gourds, and is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, yellow flowers that are typically followed by orange or red berries. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
